document_data.name: Invisible Stalker
document_data.mainbody: The '''Invisible Stalker language''', properly known as '''Sshai''',{{Cite polyhedron/93/A Fool's Errand: The Viper Comes To Ravens Bluff|19}}<ref group="note" name="sshai">"Sshai" was originally presented as an alternative name for invisible stalkers in the indices of ''[[Creature Catalogue]]''. was the racial language of [[invisible stalker]]s, a race of [[elemental]] beings native to the [[Elemental Plane of Air]].
document_data.Description: The sounds of this language were reminiscent of the roaring and whooshing that could be heard during wind storms.
